Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: No. (looking down in fear) But I don't like this!

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Out of the way! (raising her wand) Alohomora!

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Didn't really expect that to work.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Dunamis! Liberare! Annihilare! Emancipare! No. No. No. No.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: You might try --

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Quiet! I'm trying to think.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: BOMBARDA! KA-BOOM! The CELL DOOR ROCKETS to the sky.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: That'll do.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: You truly are your father's son, Harry!

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: I'll be forever grateful for this. To both of you.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: I want to go with you.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: One day perhaps. For some time... life will be too... unpredictable. Besides, you're meant to be here. Black claps his shoulder, looks him in the eye.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: But promise me something, Harry.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Anything.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Trust yourself. No matter the challenges you face -- and I fear they will be many -- you'll be surprised how many times you can find the answers... (tapping his heart) ...here. As Sirius climbs atop Buckbeak, a SHOOTING STAR arcs through the heavens.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: A shooting star. Make a wish. WHACK! -- Black gives Buckbeak a SLAP and they soar into the glittering sky. Harry and Hermione stand watching, when... DING! They wheel. Look to the Clock Tower.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: We have to go. (CONTINUED)

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: By the way, when in doubt, I always find retracing my steps to be a wise place to begin... Good luck. As Dumbledore begins to close the door, Harry and

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Well?

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: He's free -- Sirius. We... we did it.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Did what? With a twinkle in his eye, Dumbledore swings open the door. As Harry and Hermione enter.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: How'd you two get over there? I was just talking to you... over there. (CONTINUED)

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: What d'you think, Harry? Too much for him -- everything that's happened tonight?

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Afraid so. Always been a bit of the nervous type, Ron has.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Hello, Harry.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Saw you coming. The Marauder's Map lies open on an otherwise bare desk.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: I've looked worse, believe me.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: You've been sacked.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Resigned, actually. (CONTINUED)

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Resigned! But why!

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: It seems that someone has let slip the nature of my condition.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Snape.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Whoever. It was bound to get out. This time tomorrow, the owls will start arriving. Parents will not want a -- someone like me -- teaching their children.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: But Dumbledore --

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Has already risked enough on my behalf. Besides, people like me, well... let's just say I'm used to this by now. But before I go, tell me about your Patrons.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Well. At first I thought it was a horse, or perhaps a unicorn, but I think it was --

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: A stag.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Yes.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Your father used to transform into one. That's how he was able to keep me company when I became... sick. He was a great friend James.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: There are stories about him and your mother, you know. Some are even true. But I think it's safe to say, in the end, you'll know them best by getting to know yourself.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Mischief managed.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Stand back, I said! I'll take it upstairs if you don't settle! As Harry arrives, he glances at Hermione, who CLEARS HER THROAT LOUDLY. The others turn, begin all speaking at once.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Harry! Wherever did you get it!

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Can I have a go, Harry? After you, of course --

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Quiet! (as they oblige) Thank you. Let the man through. Mystified, Harry steps forward, the boys peeling away, clearing his view of the BROOMSTICK in Ron's hands. The LABEL GLEAMS: "FIREBOLT."

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Whose is that?

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: (as everyone laughs) Whose is it? It's yours, mate.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: But... how? Who?

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: It's a mystery. Though... this fell out of the wrapping.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: That's a Hippogriff feather -- As Harry stops short, Hermione raises her eyebrow. As they share a secret glance, we...

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Go on, Harry.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Yeah. Let's see.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: I don't think it works. I think it's defective. A collective GROAN. Dejected, many of the kids begin to drift toward the castle. Harry calls after.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: Oh, come on now. It's just a broom.

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: (nodding sagely) Just a broom. (CONTINUED)

Movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Dialogue: The fastest broom in the world. As everyone turns -- WHOOSH! -- Harry JETS OFF and we --
